mapper.select: SELECT work_prop_name AS workPropName, SUM (loginTimes) AS total FROM ( SELECT staffAccount,loginTimes, table2.work_prop_name FROM ( SELECT staff_account AS staffAccount, COUNT ( 1 ) AS loginTimes FROM tb_itm_tyrz_login_auth_log WHERE target_client_id =#{targetClientId} GROUP BY staff_account ) AS table1 LEFT JOIN empee_acct_info table2 ON table1.staffAccount = table2.staff_account ) AS table3 GROUP BY work_prop_name

select dept_name as orgName,orgId, num from (select org_id as orgId ,count(1) as num from intf_soc_itzichan where org_id!='null' and category like '1%' GROUP BY org_id ) as table1 left join dept_info on table1.orgId=dept_info.dept_id order by num desc
